org.sql: SELECT members.* FROM members INNER JOIN users ON users.id = members.user_id WHERE members.project_id = "$1" AND users.type IN ("$2", "$3")

rewrites.sql: SELECT members.* FROM members WHERE members.project_id = "$1"
SELECT members.* FROM members WHERE members.project_id = "$1" LIMIT 1
SELECT members.* FROM members INNER JOIN users ON users.id = members.user_id WHERE members.project_id = "$1" AND users.type IN ("$2", "$3") LIMIT 1
